title: Thirtysomething
description: Hope and Michael Steadman are still adjusting to parenthood while struggling with money problems and best-friend crises.

title: The Parents Are Coming
description: Everyone loves Hope's mother - except Hope who drives Michael and her friends crazy as she anticipates a visit from her parents.

title: Housewarming
description: Michael and Hope race to renovate their crumbling mansion for a huge housewarming party.

title: Couples
description: A night out with friends degenerates as Nancy and Elliot's marital woes become apparent.

title: But Not for Me
description: Gary and Melissa rekindle their affair; Michael and Hope's first date in months is a disaster.

title: We Gather Together
description: Hope and Michael plan a quiet Thanksgiving but learn friends are counting on being invited.

title: Nice Work If You Can Get It
description: Before a deadline, Michael and Elliot wrestle with a creativity block; Ellyn develops a crush on an associate.

title: Weaning
description: Sensing baby Janey's decreasing dependency on her, depressed Hope decides to go back to work.

title: I'll Be Home for Christmas
description: Michael and Hope argue about whether their infant's first holiday should be Christmas or Hanukkah. A famous photographer shows interest in Melissa's work.

title: South by Southeast
description: Gary is in love, but as things start to get serious he receives a series of threats on his life - and the likely suspect is a jealous psychology professor.

title: Therapy
description: Elliot and Nancy seek professional help for their troubled marriage; Michael finds it hard to keep it a secret.

title: Competition
description: When an important client makes it clear that he prefers Elliot to Michael, Michael finds himself growing increasingly more envious of his partner.

title: Separation
description: Elliot temporarily moves in with Michael and Hope after separating from Nancy.

title: I'm in Love, I'm in Love, I'm in Love, I'm in Love, I'm in Love with a Wonderful Gynecologist
description: Competing for the attention of the same man jeopardizes the new found friendship between Ellyn and Melissa.

title: Business as Usual
description: Michael's hopes for a joyous reunion with his father are destroyed when he discovers the real reason for the visit.

title: Accounts Receivable
description: A rocky relationship between Michael and his brother Brad is further strained when Michael learns the family business is almost bankrupt.

title: Whose Forest Is This?
description: Nancy and Elliot's separation takes its toll on their son; Elliot prepares for a blind date with a chiropractor.

title: Nancy's First Date
description: Melissa's burgeoning romance slows when she learns he doesn't want any more kids. Nancy has her first date since the separation.

title: Undone
description: Michael's old girlfriend from college pays a visit.

title: Tenure
description: Gary evaluates the fate of his academic career as he undergoes tenure review at the college. Ellyn learns her building is going co-op, leaving her to decide whether to buy her apartment.

title: Born to Be Mild
description: Ellyn and Woodman's weekend is ruined when they are forced to babysit Janey.

title: We'll Meet Again
description: While cleaning out the house, Hope comes across the World War II era diary of the house's previous owner: a young nurse who was waiting for her husband to return from the war.

title: In Re: The Marriage of Weston
description: Elliot and Nancy continue with divorce proceedings as each reflects back on some of the happy times of their relationship.

title: The Mike Van Dyke Show
description: Michael struggles with the Christmas season and Hope finds out she's pregnant. Michael views the events similar to the a black and white Dick Van Dyke episode...in this case the 'Mike Van Dyke.'

title: Trust Me
description: Melissa and Gary contemplate having a baby together even though Michael, Ellyn and Hope are against.

title: No Promises
description: Ellyn must face some difficult truths about herself and her complicated relationship with her parents.

title: Politics
description: Michael and Elliot take a job working for a political candidate whose reputation is questionable.

title: Success
description: Elliot and Michael's ad agency founders toward bankruptcy as Melissa's career takes off with an assignment to photograph Carly Simon.

title: First Day/Last Day
description: Michael and Elliot relive their past while they look for work and close down their company.

roles.char: Voice of Sherman Howard on answering machine

title: About Last Night
description: Gary and Susannah attempt to come to terms with accidental pregnancy.

title: Elliot's Dad
description: Elliot is forced to re-evaluate himself as a man when his father, Charlie, arrives for a visit.

title: Payment Due
description: Ellyn is hospitalized for a bleeding ulcer and estranges her friends and lover.

title: Deliverance
description: The group discovers some things about themselves when the girls go camping and the men stay home with the children.

title: Michael Writes a Story
description: Michael takes a writing class, but the quality of his writing improves only after he deals with some other areas of his life.

title: New Job
description: Hope competes with Michael's new job for his attention after the miscarriage of their baby.

title: Be a Good Girl
description: Melissa discovers the controlling motivation behind her grandmother's love when she becomes heir to a used clothing store.

title: Courting Nancy
description: Elliot challenges Matt to an unspoken competition for Nancy's love.

title: Best of Enemies
description: Hope writes an article which initially antagonizes, then reconciles Gary and Susannah to the Steadmans.

title: Nancy's Mom
description: Nancy's mom comes to visit and she and Elliot vie for Nancy's time, affection and future.

title: Love and Sex
description: Michael and Hope temporarily lose sexual attraction for one another but after a series of circumstances, their romance is rekindled.

title: Mr. Right
description: When Melissa uses a video dating service service to find the ideal date, she learns that the not-so-ideal date is the one she really wants.

title: New Baby
description: Susannah gives birth to a baby girl after struggling with many fears.

title: Legacy
description: Michael plans a dinner party for his boss, which does not have the anticipated effect, and Elliot and Nancy decide to remarry.

title: Strangers
description: Melissa struggles with her love for a younger man and her embarassment over their age difference.

title: Pilgrims
description: Elliot moves back home and Ethan is afraid he will leave again.

title: The Burning Bush
description: The long-time friendship Hope and Ellyn share withstands the present conflict between them when Ellyn gets involved with a married man.

title: New Parents
description: Gary and Susannah confront issues surrounding their return to work and the care of their new baby.

title: Michael's Campaign
description: Michael and Elliot are working on a new account at DAA at the same time Hope is working with a group to protest a waste disposal plant being in the area.

title: Pulling Away
description: When Michael is promoted to Creative Director he doesn't know how to handle his new position and creates some tensions between himself and Elliot.

title: Another Country
description: Nancy finds out she ovarian cancer.

title: Post-Op
description: After Nancy's surgery, the family is united in their desire to see Nancy conquer cancer, yet they struggle with fear.

title: Once a Mermaid
description: Ellyn restarts her affair with Richard, this time in earnest.

title: Fathers and Lovers
description: Melissa peruades Lee to take a job at the DAA, while she resists her father's pressure to make a real estate investment.

title: Her Cup Runneth Over
description: Jeffrey and his daughter come to live with Ellyn after his marriage breaks up and all threee of them face some rough times.

title: Good Sex, Some Sex, What Sex, No Sex
description: Melissa and Lee are experiencing a high point in their relationship, when things begin to unravel.

title: The Other Shoe
description: Nancy gets involved with some new friends who also have cancer and unintentionally ostracizes her family.

title: Three Year Itch
description: Michael is so consumed with his career that he is not aware Hope feels drawn towards John Dunaway.

title: I'm Nobody, Who Are You?
description: Gary takes a teaching job and both he and Susannah contend with resentment towards their affluent friends, Michael and Hope.

title: Arizona
description: Michael and Hope visit her parents and are inspired to come to grips with their drifting relationship.

title: Going Limp
description: Elliot has to overcome self-doubt and the skepticism of others when he directs a television commercial.

title: The Go Between
description: Michael fails as a mediator for a company in their attempt to buy out Miles, and he fires Elliot as part of a new plan to take over the agency.

title: Samurai Ad Man
description: Elliot and Michael secretly help Minnesota Brands take over DAA; Miles fights the move.

title: Prelude to a Bris
description: Michael and Hope debate over a bris for Leo; guests Barbara Barrie, Alan King.

title: Life Class
description: Nancy's constantly changing sexual feelings affect her marriage; Hope feels overwhelmed by two children.

title: Control
description: A photography assignment brings Melissa and Miles together; Jeffrey and Ellyn look for an apartment.

title: The Distance
description: Susannah's New York job offer threatens her relationship with Gary; Ellyn ponders her relationship with Jeffrey.

title: The Haunting of DAA
description: A founder haunts Michael after Miles orders him to cut DAA's staff.

title: The Guilty Party
description: Hope throws a surprise party for Michael to ease her guilt over attention to the baby; guest Renee Taylor.

title: Photo Opportunity
description: Family and career demands pull Melissa in opposite directions; guests Phyllis Newman, Joe Maher.

title: Never Better
description: After beginning an unlikely relationship with Gary, Ellyn is attracted to a former date.

title: Guns and Roses
description: Nancy's problems with cancer therapy affect her relationships with her children; Elliot is jealous of award-nominee Michael.

title: Happy New Year
description: A mysterious phone call changes the Steadmans' reminiscence-filled New Year's Eve party.

title: Melissa and Men
description: An art gallery wants to exhibit Melissa's photos about her failed relationships.

title: Advanced Beginners
description: The appearance of his ex complicates Ellyn and her new boyfriend's cohabitation.

title: Sifting the Ashes
description: Nancy prepares for her last round of chemotherapy; Elliot visits his mother (Eileen Brennan) during a business trip.

title: Second Look
description: Nancy's upcoming surgery places great strain on her family and friends.

title: Fighting the Cold
description: An incident and the results of Nancy's surgery force everyone to re-evaluate lives and futures.

title: The Difference Between Men and Women
description: The men plan a bachelor party for Billy; the women try to think of something different for Ellyn.

title: A Wedding
description: Billy's family and Ellyn experience doubt on the eve of the wedding.

title: Closing the Circle
description: Agency crises and administration of Gary's estate pull Michael in opposite directions.

title: Out the Door
description: Michael sides with Miles in rejecting Elliot's proposal; directed by Mel Harris.

title: Hopeless
description: Volunteer Hope befriends two homeless-shelter occupants.

title: A Stop at Willoughby
description: Long hours and a demanding client stress Michael to the limit.

title: Melissa in Wonderland
description: In Hollywood to photograph a TV star (Brooke Adams), Melissa gets caught in the bizarre machinations of television.

title: California
description: After returning from California, Michael faces decisions that will affect his personal and professional lives.
